channel.title: I need help help with Options
channel.description:
When working on my server, i came across a problem with the wannetalk option selection.
After typing in the question asks, the first option answer, the second option answer and the third, i was unsure how to tell the server which one was selected.
Heres my question: How do you make an action occur after one of the options is selected?

item.title: I need help help with Options
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

[quote=“b e z e r k, post:2, topic:121686”]Do You Mean This–

You Click To Talk To A Npc.
He Says 2 Diffrent Things.
And For Each Saying He Has, Should Have A Diffrent Reaction
Like A Series Of Conversation.

If So…I Have No Clue. Just Though I Should Post This To Make It EAsier To Understand

                                     --B E Z E R K--[/quote]

lawl…
ok to make this work…
you need to open client.java and search for this…

OPPS!! sorry the code i posted would of given you 100 errors, hold on, i didn’t add it right.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help help with Options

Like A Series Of Conversation.
